Command.Description: Resets the SpectraCyber

Parameter.Name: Reset.Mode
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: Soft, Defaults

Command.Description: Pings the SpectraCyber Controller
Gets the configuration of the SpectraCyber Controller in XML
Starts the Instrument
Stops the Instrument
Gets the Version of the Controller OS
Apply a Filter to the selected dataset

Parameter.Name: Filter.Name
Parameter.Tooltip: Select a Filter to apply to the RawData to create ProcessedData

Parameter.Name: ApplyTo.ChannelID
Parameter.Tooltip: Any Channel ID for the current dataset, or -1, to apply to all channels

Parameter.Name: ApplyTo.Dataset
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: RawData,ProcessedData

Command.Description: Segment a Time Series into a set of files

Parameter.Name: Segment.Size
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: Day,Daytime,Hour,Minute

Parameter.Name: Pathname
Parameter.Tooltip: The pathname used for saving the individual files e.g. archive

Parameter.Name: Format
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: CommaSeparated,TabSeparated,FormattedStardata,CompressedStardata

Parameter.Name: ApplyTo.Dataset
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: RawData

Command.Description: Calculate Pearson Correlation Coefficient between Temperature and Data

PluginMetadata.md:Description: The number of channels of data produced by this Instrument

Command.Description: Captures the Radiometer continuum output at the current frequency setting

Parameter.Name: SampleInterval
Parameter.Tooltip: The time interval between data samples (1 to 1000 seconds)

Parameter.Name: Capture.Period
Parameter.Tooltip: The total time of data capture (1 to 100000 seconds)

Parameter.Name: Capture.Filter
Parameter.Tooltip: Select a Filter to apply to the RawData to create ProcessedData

Parameter.Name: RealtimeUpdate
Parameter.Tooltip: Controls updates on every sample read. Allowed values: true or false

Parameter.Name: VerboseLogging
Parameter.Tooltip: Controls verbose Command execution logging. Allowed values: true or false

Command.Description: Captures the spectrum between -2000 to 2000 kHz in 5kHz steps

Parameter.Name: Frequency.Start
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: -2000 to 2000 in steps of 5

Parameter.Name: Frequency.End
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: -2000 to 2000 in steps of 5

Parameter.Name: Frequency.Step
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: 5, 10, 15, 20, 25, 50 kHz

Parameter.Name: WaitPeriod
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: 1 to 10000sec

Parameter.Name: RealtimeUpdate
Parameter.Tooltip: Controls updates on every sample read. Allowed values: true or false

Parameter.Name: VerboseLogging
Parameter.Tooltip: Controls verbose Command execution logging. Allowed values: true or false

Command.Description: Sets the Radiometer gain x1, x5, x10, x20, x50, x60

Parameter.Name: Radiometer.Gain
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: 1, 5, 10, 20, 50, 60

Command.Description: Sets the Radiometer Time Constant to 0.3s, 1s, 10s

Parameter.Name: Radiometer.TimeConstant
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: 0.3, 1, 10

Command.Description: Sets the Radiometer Offset Voltage 0 to 4095mV

Parameter.Name: Radiometer.Offset
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: 0 to 4095

Command.Description: Gets the Radiometer output 0.0 to 10.0V
Sets the Spectrometer gain x1, x5, x10, x20, x50, x60

Parameter.Name: Spectrometer.Gain
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: 1, 5, 10, 20, 50, 60

Command.Description: Sets the Spectrometer Time Constant to 0.3s, 0.5s, 1s

Parameter.Name: Spectrometer.TimeConstant
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: 0.3, 0.5, 1

Command.Description: Sets the Spectrometer Offset Voltage 0 to 4095mV

Parameter.Name: Spectrometer.Offset
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: 0 to 4095

Command.Description: Sets the Spectrometer Receive Frequency offset -2000 to 2000 kHz in 5kHz steps

Parameter.Name: Spectrometer.Frequency
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: -2000 to 2000 in steps of 5

Command.Description: Gets the Spectrometer output 0.0 to 10.0V
Import the selected Metadata

Parameter.Name: MetadataType
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: Framework, Observatory, Observer, Observation, Instrument, Controller, All Plugins

Command.Description: Import a custom Metadata file from the local file system

Parameter.Name: Filename
Parameter.Tooltip: The filename of the Metadata to be imported

Command.Description: Set the Value of the selected Metadata item

Parameter.Name: Metadata.Key
Parameter.Tooltip: A Metadata Key valid for the current Instrument and dataset

Parameter.Name: Metadata.Value
Parameter.Tooltip: The requested new Value of the Metadata

Command.Description: Calculate the Velocity of the Local Standard of Rest

Parameter.Name: Vlsr.RightAscension
Parameter.Tooltip: The RightAscension of the direction for which to calculate Vlsr, as HH:MM:SS

Parameter.Name: Vlsr.Declination
Parameter.Tooltip: The Declination of the direction for which to calculate Vlsr as +/-DD:MM:SS

Parameter.Name: Vlsr.Epoch
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: J2000 (Julian FK5), B1950.0 (Besselian FK4)

Parameter.Name: Vlsr.ReferenceFrame
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: Geocentric, Topocentric

Command.Description: Saves the current MetaData in the specified file and format

Parameter.Name: Filename
Parameter.Tooltip: The pathname/filename to be saved without file extension e.g. archive/Metadata

Parameter.Name: Timestamp
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: true or false, to control the addition of a timestamp to the filename

Parameter.Name: Format
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: CommaSeparated,TabSeparated,FormattedStardata,CompressedStardata

Command.Description: Remove the selected Metadata

Parameter.Name: MetadataType
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: Framework, Observatory, Observer, Observation, Instrument (all), MetadataMetadata

Command.Description: Get a single data file from the local file system

Parameter.Name: Filename
Parameter.Tooltip: The filename to be processed

Parameter.Name: Format
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: CommaSeparated,TabSeparated,FormattedStardata,CompressedStardata

Parameter.Name: Import.Filter
Parameter.Tooltip: Select a Filter to apply to the RawData to create ProcessedData

Command.Description: Saves the Command Log in the specified file

Parameter.Name: Filename
Parameter.Tooltip: The pathname/filename to be saved without file extension e.g. archive/CommandLog

Parameter.Name: Timestamp
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: true or false, to control the addition of a timestamp to the filename

Parameter.Name: Format
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: CommaSeparated,TabSeparated,FormattedStardata,CompressedStardata

Command.Description: Saves the current chart as an image in the specified file

Parameter.Name: Filename
Parameter.Tooltip: The pathname/filename to be saved without file extension e.g. archive/Chart

Parameter.Name: Timestamp
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: true or false, to control the addition of a timestamp to the filename

Parameter.Name: Format
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: JPG, PNG (PNG preferred)

Parameter.Name: Width
Parameter.Tooltip: The width of the image in pixels (32 to 3000)

Parameter.Name: Height
Parameter.Tooltip: The height of the image in pixels (32 to 3000)

Command.Description: Sets the 70MHz gain 10dB to 25.75dB in 0.25dB steps
Sets the Bandwidth to 15kHz or 30kHz

Parameter.Name: Bandwidth
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: 15 or 30

Command.Description: Controls the external Noise Source

Parameter.Name: NoiseSource
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: true or false

Command.Description: Waits for the specified number of Seconds

Parameter.Name: WaitPeriod
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: 1 to 10000sec

Command.Description: Copies the most recent ResponseValue to the host Clipboard

Output.Name: CommandLog
Output.Description: The Command Log produced by the DAO

Output.Name: ProcessedData
Output.Description: The Processed Data produced by the DAO

Output.Description: The Raw Data produced by the DAO

Output.Name: InstrumentLog
Output.Description: The Instrument Log produced by the DAO

Output.Name: EventLog
Output.Description: The Event Log produced by the DAO

Output.Name: MetaData

Output.Name: Configuration
